html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09102023-09-25FIN
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations and the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING REGULATIONS and the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) require all entities involved in the mortgage lending process to meet certain obligations; and (2) require Canadian financial entities to take reasonable measures to assess the reputation of the foreign financial entities and conduct risk assessments and ongoing monitoring of their correspondent banking relationships.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0194 Publication Date: 2023-10-11
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Regulations and the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING REGULATIONS and the PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) require all entities involved in the mortgage lending process to meet certain obligations; and (2) require Canadian financial entities to take reasonable measures to assess the reputation of the foreign financial entities and conduct risk assessments and ongoing monitoring of their correspondent banking relationships.
